item.description:
Join us for an in-depth discussion of  iAd tapping techniques.  Bring yours... I'll bring mine, we'll talk and tap. 

We'll spend some time getting acquainted, showing & telling until 6:30-7pm. As usual: Thrilling discoveries will be shared, opportunities discussed, quandaries solved & commiserated, networking conducted, snacks indulged. Feel free to bring any of the above and share it in this first portion of the meeting or get ahold of me in advance to share a longer presentation. 

In addition to that: I'd like to share a few things I've learned lately with getting my third app on the store.  

If time allows, I'll also be prepared to share a look at my current rudimentary state of progress on making Core Data work in an app for iPad. Have you ever tried working with it??  If not: I'd like to tell you what I know (it won't take long, could be comical), and if so: we'd love to hear your thoughts on my approach and better yet: your own.  

We'll be finished by around 8:30.
item.how_to_find_us: First floor office facing Franklin Arterial
item.name: Talk iOS development
